import api from"../api/api";import"./Products.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Products(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function fetchProducts(){try{const response=await api.get("/products");setProducts(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("❌ Failed to fetch products:",error);alert("Failed to load products.");}}fetchProducts();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Product List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products/new",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add-product-button",children:"\u2795 Add New Product"})}),products.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"product-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Product Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Stock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Price (\u20B9)"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:products.map((p,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:p.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:p.stock}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:p.price})]},index))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No products available."})]});}export default Products;
